io.uiza.core.view.draggablepanel.transformer

Class ScaleTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.uiza.core.view.draggablepanel.transformer.Transformer
      • io.uiza.core.view.draggablepanel.transformer.ScaleTransformer

  • public class ScaleTransformer
extends Transformer
    Transformer extension created to scale the view instead of resize it as the other implementation does. This implementation is based on Nineoldanroids library to scale the view.

        Specified by:

        Returns:
